string.value: #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says the emblem signifies a demon. Let's talk to her.
#rCrocell#k, who was sealed in the Bottom Floor of Nautilus, has been released. Let's go find #b#@1092013:##k in the Generator Room and sort out this situation.
The Treasure Map has been completed, but it turned out to be the demon's prank!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2000 Able to proceed to 'Searching for the Demon' as next quest.

According to the ancient book in #bNautilus#k, this is an emblem that signifies #rCrocell#k the demon. She's a vicious demon that creates illusions that blinds humans. That Treasure Map was just one of #rCrocell#k's many pranks.

But since you've gained experience and strength through this mission, let's not consider the mission a complete waste.\n\nI heard #rCrocell#k was sealed in the #bthe Bottom Floor of the Nautilus#k... Someone must have released #rCrocell#k's seal then. But from what I know, it takes someone with unimaginable force to break that seal. I have a bad feeling about this.
Perhaps we should ask #b#p1092013##k in the Generator Room and see if we can get some information.
#b#p1092013##k was the closest one to the location where the demon had been sealed, so he may know something. Please go talk to him and see if you can find out what is going on.
Hurry! We don't have much time.

Yes, I'm #b#p1092013##k...

A demon? A seal?

What are you talking about?

Oh, the demon was sealed inside?
I know what you're talking about... As far as I could tell, it was already opened. Besides, it was a long time ago...

Return to #b#p1072008##k in #bNautilus#k.
